title: VOLT Help.
content:
Hello Typophiles.

Does anyone knows about VOLT programming for Devanagari fonts ??\_  
I’ve just finished with the design part of a Devanagari font and now I want to make it work. I really don’t know anything about programming. I have more than 700 characters in it but only 110 have the Unicode assigned to them. How do I make others work\_?

Please share if you have some links or VOLT tutorials.

Thanks,  
Satya

 [‹ Arabian fonts.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38208 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type Classifications ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180659/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38312 "Go to next forum topic")
author: satya
